text: Dorothy H. Crawford FRSE OBE is professor of medical microbiology and assistant principal for public understanding of medicine at the University of Edinburgh. She has written a number of books on viruses. ==Selected publications== * The Invisible Enemy: A Natural History of Viruses. Oxford University Press, Oxford, 2002. * Virus Hunt. Oxford University Press, Oxford, 2013. * Deadly Companions. Oxford University Press, Oxford, 2018. * Viruses: A Very Short Introduction. Oxford University Press, Oxford, 2018. == References == ==External links== *Crawford talking about The hunt for the origins of HIV.
